body:
Hello Everone,

is THERM capable of simulating a layer of vegetation (with or without soil)? In Energy+ there´s a possibilty to take Minimum Stomatal Resistance and Moisture Diffusion etc. into account.

([http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/how-to-simu...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/how-to-simulate-below-grade-architecture-how-to-make-a-green-roof))



Best regards,

Dominik
